headline: Is Now the Right Moment for Amex After a 27% Rally and Strong Earnings Momentum?
summary: If you find yourself debating whether to hold, buy, or cash out your American Express shares, you are definitely not alone. Over the past year, American Express has seen an impressive 27.2% increase, with longer stretches looking even more eye-catching for patient investors. The five-year return is 233.5%. Clearly, something is working for this stock, and those developments have many investors rethinking what a "growth story" means in a world of shifting consumer finance and payment...

headline: American Express (AXP) Becomes Payments Partner for Hard Rock Stadium
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the best long-term stocks to invest in according to Warren Buffett. On August 20, the company became the official payments partner of Hard Rock Stadium, the Miami Dolphins, and the Formula 1 Crypto.com Miami Grand Prix through a multi-year agreement. As per the deal, eligible American Express cardholders […]
